name: Bloodrush (Rexent Games)
description:
In this small game you have to protect the hostage from the enemies. Don’t let them kill the hostage! You need to hold out for 3 minutes to win. Your only weapon is a machete. 

The lights may go out once a minute, so keep your eyes open!

WASD - move
I - flip
J - hit

This game has been created during the Ludum dare 46.

creators: Maxim Kuznetsov & Vsevolod Volkov

music: Gleb Orlov
